In 1999 , he founded the Guy Harvey Research Institute at Nova 's Oceanographic Center in cooperation with Nova Southeastern University in Fort Lauderdale , Florida .

The institute , which is funded in part by contributions from his charitable Guy Harvey Ocean Foundation , conducts research on the ecology , genetics , behavior , physiology , and evolution of fish .
